prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Strings, Drums, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
1. Piano, Drums, Bass, and Strings - no Guitar in this one.
2. No Guitar here - just Piano, Strings, Drums, and Bass.
3. This song features Piano, Strings, Drums, and Bass - no Guitar.
